section_description:
Constance: 
- ENABLE_COACH_CALL_SYSTEM enabled
- ENABLE_AI_SCREENING_ASSISTANT enabled
- AUTO_REJECT_LOW_RATINGS disabled
title: Verify Pro can apply any available positions with AI coach call

custom_steps_separated.content:
To apply for more positions, navigate to either following locations to start a coach call

- "Open shifts" -> "Screening call" section -> tap "Call now"
- "Shift access" -> scroll down to "All positions" -> "Available" or "Manage positions" -> tap "Start call"

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/abc12345-1111-2222-3333-444444444444) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/abc12345-1111-2222-3333-444444444445)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro is redirected to "Experience screening call" screen where Pro can tap on either language to start coach call

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/abc12345-1111-2222-3333-444444444446)

custom_steps_separated.content:
To simulate a coach call and have proper Gig position logs created. 
- Script #70 in https://company-wiki.example.com/spaces/EN/pages/2902294740/QA+Shell+short+cuts+and+tips.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Once the coach call is completed, checked "Worker positions" in AdminPortal
- Worker positions: https://admin.example.com/positions/worker-positions/
- You can filter by "Pro userProfile ID"


Approved entry-level positions: 
- status: active
- Approved note: Onboarding flow position auto-approval

Approved skilled positions (ex. Dishwasher):
- status: active
- Approved note: ai_screening_approved_rating

Skilled positions rejected by AI coach call (ex. Bartender)
- status: rejected_by_ai_screening
- Disabled note: ai_screening_rejected_rating

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/abc12345-1111-2222-3333-444444444447)
